00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: physics
00003 !
00008 
00009 module physics
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: sample_source,perform_physics,get_eidx
00014 
00015 contains
00016 
00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! SAMPLE_SOURCE
00021 
00022   subroutine sample_source()
00023 
00024     use global, only: mat,neut
00025 
00026     ! local variables
00027     integer :: idx ! index for sampling
00028     real(8) :: rn  ! sampled random number
00029 
00030     ! sample a random number
00031     rn = rand(0)
00032 
00033     ! compute index in cdf
00034     idx = ceiling(rn / mat%source%cdf_width) + 1
00035 
00036     ! bounds checker
00037     if (idx > size(mat%source%E)) then
00038       write(*,*) 'Bounds error on source samplings'
00039       write(*,*) 'Random number:',rn
00040       write(*,*) 'Index Location:',idx
00041       stop
00042     end if
00043 
00044     ! extract that E and set it to neutron
00045     neut%E = mat%source%E(idx)
00046 
00047   end subroutine sample_source
00048 
00049 !===============================================================================
00050 ! PERFORM_PHYSICS
00053 
00054   subroutine perform_physics()
00055 
00056     use global, only: neut
00057 
00058     integer :: isoidx   ! isotope index
00059     integer :: reactid  ! reaction id
00060 
00061     ! sample isotope
00062     isoidx = sample_isotope()
00063 
00064     ! sample reaction in isotope
00065     reactid = sample_reaction(isoidx)
00066 
00067     ! perform reaction
00068     if (reactid == 1) then ! absorption
00069       neut%alive = .FALSE.
00070     else if (reactid == 2) then ! scattering
00071       call elastic_scattering(isoidx)
00072     else
00073       write(*,*) "Something is wrong after isotope sampling"
00074       stop
00075     end if
00076 
00077   end subroutine perform_physics
00078 
00079 !===============================================================================
00080 ! GET_EIDX
00083 
00084   function get_eidx(E) result(eidx)
00085 
00086     use global, only: mat
00087 
00088     ! formal variables
00089     real(8)             :: E    ! neutron's energy
00090     integer             :: eidx ! the energy index
00091 
00092     ! compute index
00093     eidx = ceiling((log10(E) - log10(mat%E_min))/mat%E_width) + 1
00094 
00095     ! check bounds
00096     if (eidx == 0 .or. eidx >=mat%npts) then
00097       write(*,*) 'Energy index out of bounds!'
00098       write(*,*) 'Energy:',E
00099       write(*,*) 'Width:',mat%E_width
00100       stop
00101    end if
00102 
00103   end function get_eidx
00104 
00105 !===============================================================================
00106 ! SAMPLE_ISOTOPE
00109 
00110   function sample_isotope() result(isoidx)
00111 
00112     use global, only: mat,eidx
00113 
00114     ! formal variables
00115     integer :: isoidx  ! the index of the isotope sampled
00116 
00117     ! local variables
00118     real(8), allocatable :: pmf(:)  ! probability mass function
00119     real(8), allocatable :: cdf(:)  ! cumulative distribution function
00120     real(8)              :: rn      ! sampled random number
00121     integer              :: i       ! iteration counter
00122 
00123     ! allocate pmf and cdf
00124     if(.not. allocated(pmf)) allocate(pmf(mat%nisotopes+1))
00125     if(.not. allocated(cdf)) allocate(cdf(mat%nisotopes+1))
00126 
00127     ! set both to zero
00128     pmf = 0.0_8
00129     cdf = 0.0_8
00130 
00131     ! create pmf at that energy index
00132     pmf(2:size(pmf)) = mat%totalxs(eidx,:)/sum(mat%totalxs(eidx,:))
00133 
00134     ! create cdf from pmf
00135     do i = 1,size(pmf)
00136       cdf(i) = sum(pmf(1:i))
00137     end do
00138 
00139     ! sample random number
00140     rn = rand(0)
00141 
00142     ! do linear table search on cdf to find which isotope
00143     do i = 1,size(cdf)
00144       if (rn <= cdf(i)) then
00145         isoidx = i - 1
00146         exit
00147       end if
00148     end do
00149 
00150     ! check iso
00151     if (isoidx == 0) then
00152       isoidx = 1 
00153     end if
00154 
00155     ! deallocate pmf and cdf
00156     if (allocated(pmf)) deallocate(pmf)
00157     if (allocated(cdf)) deallocate(cdf)
00158 
00159   end function sample_isotope
00160 
00161 !===============================================================================
00162 ! SAMPLE_REACTION
00165 
00166   function sample_reaction(isoidx) result(reactid)
00167 
00168     use global, only: mat,eidx
00169 
00170     ! formal variables
00171     integer :: isoidx   ! the sampled isotope index
00172     integer :: reactid  ! the id of the reaction type
00173 
00174     ! local variables
00175     real(8) :: pmf(3)  ! probability mass function
00176     real(8) :: cdf(3)  ! cumulative distribution function
00177     real(8) :: rn      ! sampled random number
00178     integer :: i       ! iteration counter
00179 
00180     ! set up pmf
00181     pmf = (/0.0_8,mat%isotopes(isoidx)%xs_capt(eidx),                          &
00182    &                                       mat%isotopes(isoidx)%xs_scat(eidx)/)
00183 
00184     ! normalize pmf
00185     pmf = pmf / sum(pmf)
00186 
00187     ! compute cdf
00188     do i = 1,3
00189       cdf(i) = sum(pmf(1:i))
00190     end do
00191 
00192     ! sample random number
00193     rn = rand(0)
00194 
00195     ! perform linear table search
00196     do i = 1,3
00197       if (rn < cdf(i)) then
00198         reactid = i - 1
00199         exit
00200       end if
00201     end do
00202 
00203   end function sample_reaction
00204 
00205 !===============================================================================
00206 ! ELASTIC_SCATTERING
00209 
00210   subroutine elastic_scattering(isoidx)
00211 
00212     use global, only: neut,mat,kT
00213 
00214     ! formal variables
00215     integer :: isoidx ! isotope sampled index
00216 
00217     ! local variables
00218     integer :: i     ! iteration counter
00219     integer :: idx   ! index in cdf vector
00220     integer :: kTidx ! index in kT vector
00221     real(8) :: rn    ! sampled random number
00222     real(8) :: EkT   ! energy / kT
00223     real(8) :: Eint  ! interpolated E value
00224     real(8), allocatable :: Evec(:)
00225 
00226     ! sample random number
00227     rn = rand(0)
00228 
00229     ! check for thermal scattering
00230     if (neut%E < 4e-6_8 .and. mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal) then
00231 
00232       ! get index in cdf
00233       idx = ceiling(rn/mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%cdf_width)
00234 
00235       ! check index
00236       if (idx == 0) idx = 1
00237 
00238       ! preallocate energy vector
00239       if (.not.allocated(Evec))                                                &
00240      & allocate(Evec(size(mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec)))
00241 
00242       ! set possible energy ratios vector
00243       Evec = mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%Erat(idx,:)
00244 
00245       ! get energy in kT units
00246       EkT = neut%E/kT
00247 
00248       ! find index in kT space
00249       do i = 1,size(mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec)
00250         if (EkT < mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(i)) then
00251           kTidx = i
00252           exit
00253         end if
00254       end do 
00255 
00256       ! interpolate on energy value
00257       if (kTidx == 1) then
00258         neut%E = Evec(kTidx)
00259       else
00260         ! perform linear interplation on kT value
00261         Eint = Evec(kTidx-1) + (EkT -                                          &
00262        &       mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(kTidx-1))*((Evec(kTidx)  &
00263        &     - Evec(kTidx-1))/(mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(kTidx)   &
00264        &     - mat%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(kTidx-1)))
00265 
00266        ! multiply by incoming energy
00267        neut%E = neut%E*Eint
00268 
00269       end if
00270 
00271       ! deallocate energy vector
00272       if(allocated(Evec)) deallocate(Evec)
00273 
00274     else
00275 
00276       ! perform asymptotic elastic scattering
00277       neut%E = neut%E - neut%E*(1-mat%isotopes(isoidx)%alpha)*rn;
00278 
00279     end if
00280 
00281   end subroutine elastic_scattering
00282 
00283 end module physics
